title: This looks GREAT, but sounds... - Edifier QD35
description: Purchase a Paperlike Pro Bundle at:   Transparent tech -- so hot right now. With a window into Edifier's new QD35 speaker, Dan's hoping to see big speakers, colourful lights, and... worms? Will Edifier delight, or is it all just a facade? Only one way to find out!  Buy an Edifier QD35:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something?
